tweet: Dear LTC holders, #XRP is still sitting at very good accumulation prices, you are welcome to come over to our side :)  On this side we have tangible progress, real use cases, and a lot of upside potential. Only 27 cents per coin!   Bitrue has an LTC/XRP pair of you want to switch

A Korean BBQ Restaurant & Sushi Bar is coming soon to River Edge, NJ and Litecoin Tech Support is sponsoring the #Clover POS system. We are also hooking up a sick online ordering system that will have #Litecoin as a payment option!! Real World adoption is 🔑 #PayWithLitecoin  https://t.co/JMq341yBKT
Bitcoin and Litecoin adoption will come organically and has a lot to do with generational endorsement  This natural flow of technological acceptance & approval by mass audiences will take time

Capital gains on cryptocurrency are taxed at a lower rate when held for over a year, as is the case for traditional assets  Since I don’t really spend my Bitcoin and Litecoin right now, my crypto accounting will be much easier 😎

The #LTC community is proud to announce Mohammed Saeed al-Sahaf, better known as "Baghdad Bob," to head community relations.   At a Press conference al-Sahaf announced,  "There are LTC developers here, over there, there are LTC developers everywhere. Don't be ridiculous!"  https://t.co/MJzzn1bsLj

We introduced Komodo to the Finnish cryptocurrency scene for the first time, and we had great discussions afterwards. Hard not to make an impression when you can demonstrate atomic swaps ⚛️ on the spot with real coins such as $BTC, $BCH, $DOGE, $DASH, $KMD, $LTC, etc.
